name: Tesla Model Y
description: Electric SUV blending performance, spacious interior, advanced tech. Family-friendly, eco-conscious, driving innovation.

name: Honda Accord
description: Reliable, spacious mid-size sedan offering strong performance, fuel efficiency, and advanced tech for families and commuters.

name: Tesla Model 3
description: Electric acceleration, long range, minimalist tech, Autopilot; appeals to tech-savvy, eco-conscious drivers seeking premium value.

name: Honda Civic
description: Reliable, fuel-efficient, and fun-to-drive compact car. Offers strong performance, modern tech, and practicality for everyday commuters.

name: Toyota Camry
description: Reliable, comfortable sedan for families and commuters, offering a smooth ride, efficient engines, and standard safety tech.

name: Ford Mustang
description: Iconic muscle car with potent engines, thrilling performance, and a sporty design, appealing to enthusiasts seeking American automotive spirit.

name: Toyota Tacoma
description: Rugged V6 engine, legendary off-road capability, durable build for adventure-seekers and hardworking individuals.

name: Toyota Corolla
description: Reliable, fuel-efficient engine, comfortable ride, and practical features make the Corolla a popular choice for everyday drivers seeking value.
